title: About
text:
Analytics for Accounting Data (ACCT561) focuses on how managers and auditors can use information technology to (a) identify trends in business process performance, and (b) evaluate the veracity of financial information by analyzing patterns that manifest in accounting data. The course is restricted to enrollment in the MAcc. or M.B.A program or with instructor approval.



 Back to top

title: Syllabus
text:
Modules

01. Basics of R, Python, Tableau, and Power BI


02. Working with Data


03. Data Visualization


04. Working with Databases


05. Regression


06. Machine Learning


07. Textual Analysis
